_comment: VOID GAMBIT ITEM DATABASE - UNIFIED SYSTEM

_design_rationale.single_database: All items (common, unique, store-exclusive, slot-machine-exclusive) are stored in one file for easier maintenance, no duplicate IDs, and consistent schema updates.
_design_rationale.sources_array: Defines where each item can appear: ['store', 'slot_machine', 'augment']. Allows flexible distribution without separate databases.
_design_rationale.unique_system: unique:true = once per run maximum. unique:false + stackable:false = one copy only. unique:false + stackable:true = multiple copies allowed.
_design_rationale.behavior_complexity: Indicates if item needs scripts. 'simple' = stats only, 'complex' = requires behavior_scene with game-changing logic.
_design_rationale.filtering_approach: Game systems filter this single source by 'sources' and 'unique' status rather than managing separate item pools.

_usage_examples.store_filtering: get_items_for_source('store', owned_ids) - returns available store items excluding owned unique items
_usage_examples.slot_machine_filtering: get_items_for_source('slot_machine', owned_ids) - returns available slot machine items
_usage_examples.unique_enforcement: unique items are skipped if already in owned_ids array
_usage_examples.source_exclusivity: items with sources:['store'] only appear in store, sources:['slot_machine'] only in slot machine
